body_html: @yzhwang I just update tensorflow and cuda. The GPU-util is high, while the training process is slower, compared with the previous same training program. And the log shows no info for cudnn and gpu. Thus, I think it may be the problem with the cudnn

body: @yzhwang I just update tensorflow and cuda. The GPU-util is high, while the training process is slower, compared with the previous same training program. And the log shows no info for cudnn and  gpu. Thus, I think it may be the problem with the cudnn
